author: nicko
msg: Added AddConverter(name,type) method to PatternLayout. This allows a custom
converter to be bound to the instance of the PatternLayout. A ConverterInfo
class is used to allow the converter to be specified in the Xml configuration.

author: nicko
msg: Added TypeConverter and converter that converts a string to a Type

author: nicko
msg: Changed the way that the Add<name> method is looked up. The code now supports methods
that are overloaded and finds the first one with a single argument, previously it would
only find the first method and give an error if it did not have a single argument.

author: nicko
msg: Updated tests build file to keep in sync with new version on NAnt

author: drieseng
msg: do not include this class in log4net Core as it contains win32 specific code
